Posts.Content: Thanks Gay just had a mini meltdown on Facebook messenger with hubby he video called me I had to cut him off because I was about to burst into tears poor fella it must be awful to be in his shoes too  What an absolute nightmare xx
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Thankyou so. Much Sue just getting myself ready to go for the next biopsy that is at 10.30 but seeing the consultant at 1.30 for the results of the first two I already feel like throwing upxx
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Hi Alison thankyou love xx I might see if I can find some of thoes at this stage I'm willing  to try just about anything to help me sleep I'm so tired I hope you have had a good day yourself love xx
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Hi there I'm hours away from getting my biopsy results tomorrow and having a third biopsy same breast  I'm so scared I don't know what on earth to do with myself it's like on driving myself insane and hubby has to go to work in a few hours so I'll be alone again with these horrible thoughts   I'm exhausted from not sleeping at night and if I do startling myself to waking up I don't know what to do with myself I'm not coping with this at all
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Bless you thank you so much love I'm doing lots of that talking to myself and telling myself off the mind is definitely very cruel especially at times like this  I hope you continue with your improvement love that's great to hear xx Thinking of you too xx
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Hello Helen thankyou for your kind reply love x Yes I see the consultant tomorrow for the first round of results but also having a third biopsy so it will be waiting game yet again I'm stuck for someone to call as I've not told many people what I am going through as I don't want to worry them too Probably silly I know but we've had a  very recent loss in the family from cancer and I think they have had enough to deal with  I'm happy that your results turned out well for you love that's fantastic news x I need to get through tonight hubby is coming with me tomorrow but I so wish he was home tonight but I can't tell him that it's unfair plus we can I'll afford him having time off work sadly
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Thankyou love that's very kind of you I hope all is going as well as it possibly can do for you too love I can't figure out if I want tomorrow to hurry or not I'm scared out of my whits xx
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: My problem is I'm really stuck for anyone to reach out to my daughter in law lost her mum this summer to cancer very unexpected and she's still grieving my mum in law much the same with her husband  It's all just such an awful mess
Posts.Title: Just hours away from getting my biopsy results so scared

Posts.Content: Hi Alison and thankyou for replying to me x Yes the waiting is torture very hard to cope with indeed I'm keeping myself very busy but tonight hubby is back on nights and I'm not looking forward to tonight at all  I'm hoping these next two days fly by so that I can get what ever I need straight in my head xx
Posts.Title: Awaiting breast biopsy results feel like I'm going mad

Posts.Content: Hi Helen thank you for your reply I nearly called my GP to ask that but I'm scared of taking anything as I'm on my own in the evenings  I'm driving myself crazy so it feels like and I'm trying telling myself all the things that I know are real but my mind is having none of it  I'm. Clinging to the hope that my two blood tests showing no changes shortly before these biopsies will mean good news  Wednesday has never seemed so far away I'm sure that you understand what I mean x
Posts.Title: Awaiting breast biopsy results feel like I'm going mad

Posts.Content: Thankyou for taking time to. Reply to me Gay that's very kind of you  I never realised how dangerous our own minds can be until recently and my goodness hasn't it let me know I managed to nod off a little throughout the night but I can't remember the last time I slept through the night  I've bought lots of lozenges and new pillows to help me be comfortable so that's the plan go to bed only when I'm falling asleep and take it from there  At least I had some good news today I've had an eye test and apparently that's all good x I hope  you are having a good day x
Posts.Title: Awaiting breast biopsy results feel like I'm going mad

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I'm currently awaiting my breast biopsy results that I should have on Wednesday along with having to have a 3rd biopsy on same boob that day as they have also found some calcification and they said that this cannot be done by ultrasound and has to be done by mammogram biopsy  As you can imagin I'm scared out of my whits I can't tell you the last time. I slept more than an hour or so  I'm really struggling with dry mouth and sheer panic especially when my husband leaves to work on his night shift and I'm alone if I do nod off something startles me into waking   I'm totally physically and emotionally exhausted  My question is how do we get past this and how do begin to prepare ourselves of shouldn't we  I'm totally lost and seriously struggling I hope you are all having a good day today x Reply
Posts.Title: Awaiting breast biopsy results feel like I'm going mad

Posts.Content: Well what a life changing few weeks  this has been   My head  is  reeling from all of this. Since my diagnosis on the 13th I'm  now having surgery on Friday I'm hoping some of you ladies  can advise  me . My surgeon have me some options  (obviously he's told me these can change upon him opening me up)   Option one is a lumpectomy with the one cut  from under the arm to the bottom of my Breast as they are taking the first  two  Lynpnodes  And option two  is  reduction  with the incisions are  similar to normal  Breast reduction surgery and a separate  cut under the arm for the nodes  All this will be followed  by radiotherapy and  the tabs to stop the  estrogen  I'm just seriously stuck as to which  to choose  as I am  big busted (not always comfortable as they are going south)  but I don't  want alot more pain also   Did any of you ladies have to make this choice as I'm really struggling  with it all  and need some advice  and my specialist nurse is off until tomorrow  and I feel scared out of my whits and running out of time to decide  So any help and advice would be greatly appreciated   I hope you are all having as good  and comfortable a day as possible  Deb  xxx
Posts.Title: The roller coaster ride begins Surgery on Friday
